title: in need of a therapist of pesu is anyone available?
content: can some1 voluntee for counselling / therapist in pes thanks

comments.body: Are you looking for a therapist or someone interested in getting therapy? Your question is very ambiguous.

\`\`\`  
Dear Student,

PESU is committed to provide support in the well-being of the students within the campus. If any of you have issues with concentration, attention, study methods, performance, career and personal well-being could contact any of the following Counselors. 

1. **Dr. Vijendra Kumar S.K.**

Mob: 9741056503;  
Mail ID: [vijendrak@pes.edu](mailto:vijendrak@pes.edu),

2. **Mrs. Jayashree Nadig**

Mob: 9449399556;  
Mail ID: [jayshreenadig@pes.edu](mailto:jayshreenadig@pes.edu),

3, **Mrs. Paulami Nayak**

Mob: 9123722238;  
Mail ID: [paulaminayak@pes.edu](mailto:paulaminayak@pes.edu),

Thanks & Regards,  
PES University

\`\`\`  
  
you mean this?

Do u have any experience with any of these people? 
Like are they genuine and helpful or anything like that?

I am sorry, I dont have any idea about that, and I have not contacted them for anything. 

only way to find out is, you can contact them and see, if they respond
